code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./App.css';import Navbar from'./components/layout/Navbar';import Dashboard from'./components/dashboard/Dashboard';import Nutrition from'./components/nutrition/Nutrition';import Segments from'./components/segments/Segments';import Records from'./components/records/Records';import Achievements from'./components/achievements/Achievements';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[activeTab,setActiveTab]=useState('dashboard');return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{activeTab:activeTab,onTabChange:tab=>setActiveTab(tab)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{children:[activeTab==='dashboard'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dashboard,{}),activeTab==='nutrition'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nutrition,{}),activeTab==='segments'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Segments,{}),activeTab==='records'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Records,{}),activeTab==='achievements'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Achievements,{})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("footer",{className:"app-footer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"footer-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Strava Activity Tracker \xA9 2025"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Powered by Strava API"})]})})]});}export default App;
